chosenElements.name: configius_kube_deployment.yaml
chosenElements.value:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Namespace
metadata:
  labels:
    app: configius-{{ ENV_NAME }}
  name: configius-{{ ENV_NAME }}
---
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: configius-fe
  namespace: configius-{{ ENV_NAME }}
  name: configius-fe
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: configius-fe
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
      labels:
        app: configius-fe
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: configius-fe
        image: {{ CONFIGFE_IMAGE }}
        command: ['sh', '-c', 'echo -e "{\n  \"CONFIGO_BE_HOST\":\"{{ KUBE_HOST }}\",\n  \"CONFIGO_BE_PORT\":\"{{ CONFIGBE_PORT }}\"\n}" > /usr/local/apache2/htdocs/assets/env.txt && /usr/local/apache2/bin/apachectl start && chmod -R 755 /usr/local/apache2/htdocs && while :; do echo "."; sleep 5 ; done']
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
      restartPolicy: Always
---
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: configius-be
  namespace: configius-{{ ENV_NAME }}
  name: configius-be
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: configius-be
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
      labels:
        app: configius-be
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: configius-be
        image: {{ CONFIGBE_IMAGE }}
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        env:
        - name: ENV_LOG_ACTIVE_SINCE_MINUTES
          value: "{{ ENV_LOG_ACTIVE_SINCE_MINUTES }}"
        - name: ENV_GIT_WORK_DIR
          value: "/tmp"
        - name: ENV_GIT_REPONAME
          value: "{{ ENV_GIT_REPONAME }}"
        - name: ENV_GIT_KEY_DIR
          value: "/tmp"
        - name: ENV_GIT_KEY_FILE_NAME
          value: "git_key_file"
        - name: GIT_SSH_COMMAND
          value: "ssh -i /tmp/git_key_file -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no"
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
      restartPolicy: Always
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: configius-fe
  namespace: configius-{{ ENV_NAME }}
  labels:
    app: configius-fe
spec:
  ports:
    - name: "4200"
      port:  {{ CONFIGFE_PORT }}
      targetPort: 80
  type: LoadBalancer
  externalIPs:
    - {{ KUBE_HOST }}
  selector:
    app: configius-fe
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: configius-be
  namespace: configius-{{ ENV_NAME }}
  labels:
    app: configius-be
spec:
  ports:
    - name: "3000"
      port: {{ CONFIGBE_PORT }} 
      targetPort: 3000
  type: LoadBalancer
  externalIPs:
    - {{ KUBE_HOST }}
  selector:
    app: configius-be

children.name: docker-compose.yml
children.value:
version: '3.5'
services:
  configiusfe{{ ENV_ID }}:
    image: configo_fe
    command: ['sh', '-c', 'echo -e "{\n  \"CONFIGO_BE_HOST\":\"{{ DOCKER_HOST }}\",\n  \"CONFIGO_BE_PORT\":\"3000\"\n}" > /usr/local/apache2/htdocs/assets/env.txt && /usr/local/apache2/bin/apachectl start && chmod -R 755 /usr/local/apache2/htdocs && while :; do echo "."; sleep 5 ; done']
    container_name: configius_fe_{{ ENV_ID }}
    ports: 
      - "{{ CONFIGFE_PORT }}:80"
  configiusbe{{ ENV_ID }}:
    image: configo_be
    container_name: configius_be_{{ ENV_ID }}
    ports:
      - "{{ CONFIGBE_PORT }}:3000"
    environment:
      ENV_LOG_ACTIVE_SINCE_MINUTES: {{ ENV_LOG_ACTIVE_SINCE_MINUTES }}
      ENV_GIT_WORK_DIR: /tmp/git
      ENV_GIT_REPONAME: {{ ENV_GIT_REPONAME }}
      ENV_GIT_KEY_DIR: /tmp/git
      ENV_GIT_KEY_FILE_NAME: git_key_file
      GIT_SSH_COMMAND: ssh -i /tmp/git/git_key_file -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no

children.name: deployment_docker.sh
children.value:
#cd ~/doccompv2
{{ SSH_CONNECTION_WORK_DIR }}/shutdown_docker.sh

#perl -pe "s|image: configo_fe(.+)|image: ${image_fe}|" -pi docker-compose.yml
#perl -pe "s|image: configo_be(.+)|image: ${image_be}|" -pi docker-compose.yml

{{ SSH_CONNECTION_WORK_DIR }}/startup_docker.sh

jwt=`curl -s --location --request POST 'http://localhost:3000/auth/login' --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --data-raw '{"username": "admin","password": "admin"}' | awk -F"jwtticket\":\"" '{print $2}' | sed 's|\"\}$||'`
echo " JWT ${jwt}"
curl --location --request POST 'http://localhost:3000/git/key' --header 'jwtticket: '"$jwt"'' --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --data-raw '{"key": ""}'

#docker exec configo_be /bin/sh -c "apk add git openssh"

children.name: env_shutdown_docker.sh
